to feed a DTM through schema validation and back into XNI2DTM.

msg: file XNISource.java was initially added on branch Xalan3.

author: jkesselm
msg: I'm trying to avoid propigating the XNI interfaces into too much of the
Xalan code... so unlike the SAX solution where we passed the
handler down into the low-level classes for serialization, I'm using
an enumeration to pull the data up to where DTM2XNI can access it.
